    • Uses of Settings in com.im.njams.sdk.settings.provider

      Methods in com.im.njams.sdk.settings.provider that return Settings 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Settings FileSettingsProvider.loadSettings()
      Loads the Settings from the configured file, or returns a new empty Settings if the file does not exist.
      Settings MemorySettingsProvider.loadSettings()
      Returns the Settings.
      Settings PropertiesFileSettingsProvider.loadSettings()
      Loads the Settings from the configured file, or returns a new empty Settings if the file does not exist.
      Settings SystemPropertiesSettingsProvider.loadSettings()
      Returns the Settings initialized with a copy of the current system properties set.
